name: Sweet Crasher (Image Campus)
description:
This game was created within the Summer Lab Junior 2016, a workshop by the educational institute Image Campus.

Its goal was to develop and publish a simple but complete videogame in a short term using resources from the institute.

This game was created by students from different careers and courses offered by the institute -such as Game Design, Videogame Development, 3D Modelling and Animation, and Game Art- and they were guided and assisted by professors.
